name: Enum Snippet.SubKind
text:
The detailed variety of a snippet.  This is a sub-classification of the
 Kind.  The Kind of a SubKind is accessible with
 kind().
codes:
public static enum Snippet.SubKind
extends Enum<Snippet.SubKind>

methods.description:
Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an
enum constant in this type.  (Extraneous whitespace characters are 
not permitted.)
Indicates whether this SubKind is executable.

Indicates whether this SubKind is executable and
 is non-void.
The Snippet.Kind that corresponds to this SubKind.
